## Perform Creative Design Exploration

```bash
# Step 3: Explore design options for OAuth integration
/creative
```

## Create Implementation Plan with /plan Command

```bash
# After /van determines Level 2-4 complexity
/plan

# Expected output appended to memory-bank/tasks.md:
# ## Implementation Plan
#
# ### Components to Build
# - [ ] OAuth2 configuration module
# - [ ] Authentication middleware
# - [ ] User session management
# - [ ] Token refresh mechanism
#
# ### Files to Modify
# - `src/config/auth.ts` - OAuth2 configuration
# - `src/middleware/auth.ts` - Authentication middleware
# - `src/routes/auth.ts` - Authentication routes
#
# ### Technology Validation
# - OAuth2 library: passport.js
# - Session store: Redis
# - Dependencies verified in package.json
#
# ### Components Requiring Creative Phase
# - [CREATIVE] OAuth2 flow architecture (architecture)
# - [CREATIVE] Session storage strategy (architecture)
#
# **Next Command:** /creative
```

## Explore Design Decisions with /creative Command

```bash
# After /plan identifies creative phases
/creative

# Expected output in memory-bank/creative/creative-oauth2-flow.md:
# # Creative Phase: OAuth2 Flow Architecture
#
# ## Component Requirements
# - Handle OAuth2 authorization code flow
# - Support multiple OAuth providers (Google, GitHub)
# - Manage token refresh automatically
# - Secure token storage
#
# ## Design Options
#
# | Criterion | Option A: Passport.js | Option B: Custom OAuth | Option C: Auth0 |
# |-----------|----------------------|------------------------|-----------------|
# | Implementation Complexity | Low | High | Very Low |
# | Flexibility | Medium | High | Low |
# | Cost | Free | Free | Paid |
# | Maintenance | Low | High | Very Low |
# | Control | Medium | High | Low |
#
# ## Selected Approach: Passport.js with Custom Strategies
#
# ### Rationale
# - Balances flexibility and implementation complexity
# - Free and well-maintained open source
# - Extensive provider support through strategies
# - Good community support and documentation
#
# ### Implementation Guidance
# - Create strategy factory for provider abstraction
# - Implement centralized token refresh service
# - Use Redis for secure session storage
# - Add provider-specific configuration module
#
# **Status:** COMPLETED
```

## Implement Planned Changes

```bash
# Step 4: Implement the feature
/build
```

## Implement Code with /build Command

```bash

# Expected workflow and output in memory-bank/progress.md:
# ## Build Progress
#
# ### Phase 1: OAuth2 Configuration Module
# - Created src/config/auth.ts with provider configurations
# - Implemented strategy factory pattern
```
